tool_description: This api gives the details about the Covid19 news
title: covid19-news-updates

api_list.name: To get individual request
api_list.description: This api helps you categorise based on newpapers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid19-news-updates.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newpaperid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid19-news-updates.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all covid19 news updates
api_list.description: This end point helps to fetch all the latest new about covid19
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid19-news-updates.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid19-news-updates.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
